1.name: wordpress/hilflo-most-shared
1.description:
This widget offer a new article ranking method, now you can order your article by most sharing on social network by additionning google plus, twitter and facebook shares

You can choose the title of the widget and how many article to show. If you are in a category page, then the ranking is by most shared in the current category

You can see a wordking demo at Socialqa NB :

  • You need a google api key to grab google plus shares
